Articles.Content: As it says in title. I recently re downloaded KSP and have played it a bit in the psat so i know my PC is good enough to run it. I have no mods nothing. When i click play on steam the little window with a loader comes up but then crashes.

11 minutes ago, Thopolopolov said:

As it says in title. I recently re downloaded KSP and have played it a bit in the psat so i know my PC is good enough to run it. I have no mods nothing. When i click play on steam the little window with a loader comes up but then crashes. 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1A9CLklh9ZMuFAM6tNffzfj_veY1qpJtwnu165-J_04E/edit

logs

Try running the game directly from the .exe file, instead of using steam or a launcher.

Your logs are locked to me, I cannot access them.
